00016 static const char BASES[16] = {' ', 'A', 'C', ' ',
00017                                'G', ' ', ' ', ' ', 
00018                                'T', ' ', ' ', ' ', 
00019                                ' ', ' ', ' ', 'N'};

00021 struct free_delete {
00022   void operator()(void* x) { bam_destroy1((bam1_t*)x); }
00023 };

00028 #define r_is_rev(b) (((b)->core.flag&BAM_FREVERSE) != 0)
00029 #define r_is_mrev(b) (((b)->core.flag&BAM_FMREVERSE) != 0)
00030 #define r_pos(b) ((b)->core.pos)
00031 #define r_mpos(b) ((b)->core.mpos)
00032 #define r_id(b) ((b)->core.tid)
00033 #define r_mid(b) ((b)->core.mtid)
00034 #define r_is_mapped(b) (!((b)->core.flag&BAM_FUNMAP))
00035 #define r_is_mmapped(b) (!((b)->core.flag&BAM_FMUNMAP))
00036 #define r_mapq(b) ((b)->core.qual)
00037 #define r_cig_size(b) ((b)->core.n_cigar)
00038 #define r_is_first(b) ((b)->core.flag&BAM_FREAD1)
00039 #define r_qname(b) (std::string(bam_get_qname((b).get())))
00040 #define r_remove_tag(b, t) do { uint8_t *p  = bam_aux_get((b).get(), t); if (p) bam_aux_del((b).get(), p); } while(0)
00041 #define r_flag(b) ((b)->core.flag)
00042 #define r_is_pmapped(b) (!((b)->core.flag&BAM_FUNMAP) && !((b)->core.flag&BAM_FMUNMAP))
00043 #define r_length(b) ((b)->core.l_qseq)
00044 #define r_isize(b) ((b)->core.isize)
00045 #define r_seq(b, s) do { uint8_t * p = bam_get_seq(b); char c[(b)->core.l_qseq+1]; for (int ww = 0; ww < (b)->core.l_qseq; ww++) { c[ww] = BASES[bam_seqi(p, ww)]; } c[(b)->core.l_qseq] = '\0'; s = std::string(c); } while(0)
00046 #define r_get_clip(b, p) do { uint32_t* c = bam_get_cigar(b); for (int ww = 0; ww < (b)->core.n_cigar; ww++) if (c[ww] & BAM_CSOFT_CLIP || c[ww] & BAM_CHARD_CLIP) p += bam_cigar_oplen(c[ww]); } while(0)

00048 #define r_get_Z_tag(b, t, v) do { uint8_t* p = bam_aux_get((b).get(), t); if (p) v = bam_aux2Z(p); else v = ""; } while(0) 
00049 #define r_get_SR(b, v) do { uint8_t* p = bam_aux_get((b).get(), "SR"); assert(p); v = bam_aux2Z(p); } while(0) 
00050 #define r_get_int32_tag(b, t, v) do { uint8_t* p = bam_aux_get((b).get(), t); if (p) v = bam_aux2i(p); else v = 0; } while(0)

00052 #define r_cig_type(b, i) (bam_cigar_opchr(bam_get_cigar((b).get())[i]))
00053 #define r_cig_len(b, i) (bam_cigar_oplen(bam_get_cigar((b).get())[i]))

00055 #define r_add_Z_tag(b, t, v) bam_aux_append((b).get(), t, 'Z', (v).length()+1, (uint8_t*)(v).c_str())
00056 #define r_add_int32_tag(b, t, v) bam_aux_append((b).get(), t, 'i', 4, (uint8_t*)&(v))
00057 #define r_count_nbases(b, n) do { uint8_t* p = bam_get_seq(b); for (int ww = 0; ww < (b)->core.l_qseq; ww++) if (bam_seqi(p,ww) == 15) n++; } while(0)
00058 #define r_count_sub_nbases(b, n, s, e) do { uint8_t* p = bam_get_seq(b); for (int ww = (s); ww < (e); ww++) if (bam_seqi(p,ww) == 15) n++; } while(0)

00068 #define r_get_trimmed_seq(b, s) do { int32_t ts, tl; r_get_int32_tag(b, "TS", ts);  r_get_int32_tag(b, "TL", tl); r_seq(b, s); if (tl != 0 && tl != r_length(b))  s = s.substr(ts, tl); } while (0)
